headline: Engineering Lead | MarTech & Data Platforms | Formerly @ Chegg, Natwest, Cognizant
about: A passionate leader with 11+ years of software engineering background in designing high-performance and scalable applications. Enthusiastic about making an impact on people’s life with software.Experienced in building and mentoring teams engineering teams. Enjoy working closely with the team to provide technical guidance, and architectural reviews, and keep them encouraged, motivated, and aligned with the OKRs and the company's vision.Hands-on experience in Java, NodeJS, Python, Spring Boot, AWS Services, ECS, Lambda, Kafka, Kinesis, KDA, SQL, NoSQL, TimeSeries DB Influx, GraphQL, REST, Spark, Data Modelling, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform, Grafana;MarTech platforms: Adobe Experience Platform (AEP), Adobe Analytics, Target, AJO, Braze, mParticle for Web Analytics, CDP and CRM;Data platforms: DataBricks, Redshift, Athena, Spark, Data lakes;

experience.summary:
Providing leadership and technical guidance, supporting architectural decisions, facilitating cross-team collaboration, ensuring effective stakeholder communication and overseeing work planning, fostering a motivated and competent technical culture, and driving high-quality results.Leading and managing a team of 12 backend engineers and contractors across 3 squads specializing in creating products and integrations addressing Chegg's marketing needs.My high-level technical projects at Chegg are,1) Build the website activity tracking infrastructure using microservices. This setup enables producers to publish real-time frontend and backend events to Kafka and Amazon Kinesis platforms. These events can be accessed by multiple consumers for analysis and marketing purposes.2) Engineered a robust data pipeline to facilitate real-time analytics, transactional notifications, and marketing communications. Leveraged Spring Kafka, Spring Batch, and AWS Lambda to effectively support the needs of the Analytics, Data Science, and Marketing teams.3) Developed the "Self Serve platform", enabling integration of 3+ marketing platforms for the operations team that eliminated the engineering dependencies on BAU work.4) Worked on an appliance-based architecture to provide seamless access to enriched data stored in Graph DB, facilitating efficient query services.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

My technical contributions are,1) Build/Worked on data-intensive microservices built using Spring boot that consumes data and events from upstream systems like the web and other backend applications and sends it to various third-party platforms by keeping services to work in low latency, high throughput, scalable way.2) Build/Worked on a real-time applications agnostic monitoring system using Kafka, Sprint boot, and time-series DB to monitor the real-time events, application performance, and alerting mechanism.3) Built a regression testing framework/network validator with TestCafe and NodeJS to monitor network logs, track API call statuses, and validate data. The statuses are logged and reported to our partners daily, replacing an expensive monitoring solution.4) Worked with the Data Engineering and Analytics team to migrate the front-end solution of capturing the user events to the server side to increase the data tracking accuracy.My project management contributions are,1) Work with product teams to run the sprints for the team effectively for engineers in the team adopting agile methodology.2) Make sure that requirements for the projects are better collected, and then these are discussed with the team effectively to align them with the business objectives.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

This role demands working with multiple stakeholders to improve the customer journey onsite and offsite by delivering the relevant content to maintain customer interest. It involves proactively engaging with the journey managers for continuous improvement in digital web estates.The key responsibilities are1) Collaborated with Data Engineering and Analytics teams to implement front-end and server-side tracking of user interactions and behavior for analytics programs using real-time events, increasing data tracking accuracy.2) To implement server-side tracking, we worked on an architecture based on the Kinesis data stream and used Apache Flink with a custom sink to ingest the data in the analytics platform.3) Worked on creating long-running and ad-hoc jobs in Databricks using Python to send data to third-party APIs like Facebook, Google, etc just like Airflow.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

At Royal Bank of Scotland, we are serving around 25 million customers by providing them with rich digital experiences and tailored experiences upon their journeys. Joined as digital analytics specialist to manage RBS web platforms for data improvisation and making a rich customer experience.My prime responsibilities1) Join hands with Businesses to collect KPIs and provide technical specification documents to technology teams for the successful implementation of Adobe.2) Focus on using the data layer approach for efficient and quality data collection for new platforms and improvisation of digital data on existing RBS digital estates and its subsidiaries collectively to drive better decision-making in business.3) Migrated the digital web properties of RBS from a legacy tag management system to an advanced and stable tagging platform.4) Bring in and implement third-party tools and technologies like Clicktale, Audience Manager, Live Person, and marketing pixels using Adobe DTM.5) Alongside additional curricular projects, worked on Stitching customer data from various touchpoints to create a 360-degree view of the customer. These involve using Teradata, and SAS and getting bulk digital data for a unified view of the customer journey.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

Cognizant has put forward myself in the digital analytics world. Joined as a trainee to become digital analytics consultant has helped to climb up the ladder of the digital era. My work involved getting the KPIs from multiple stakeholders transform them using Adobe Analytics solutions into successful metrics.My key responsibilities include:Collaborate with Business and technical teams to establish Adobe Solution.Advice business using custom reports on the website performance i.e. deep level details on page performance, bounce/exit rates, the effectiveness of marketing channels.Build custom tagging using JavaScipt for web platforms and assist technical teams to deploy the data layers to scrap the data from Single Page Applications.Implementation of Adobe Solutions on multiple mobile platforms like iOS/Android/windows.Utilization of Adobe Classifications for data categorization, DataWare house for bulk reports, and processing rules for post collected data modification etc. to ensure helping clients in a preeminent manner.Educate the new joiners on absorbing web analytics techniques, JavaScript in data scraping etc
            

    
    

    
        Show less

similar_profiles.name: Anshul Choudhary
similar_profiles.summary: Analytics Leader and Translator, Retail Analytics

recommendations.name: Ajay Nair
recommendations.summary:
“I had the pleasure of working alongside Anshul, one of the most talented engineers I’ve encountered. His expertise and dedication were instrumental in setting up our CRM tool and Customer Data Platform from the ground up—a massive undertaking that required not only technical skills but also strategic vision and resilience.

Anshul demonstrated exceptional problem-solving abilities and a deep understanding of system architecture. He ensured our systems were scalable, secure, and well-integrated, laying a solid foundation for our customer engagement and data initiatives. His proactive approach to identifying potential issues and optimizing processes saved us significant time and resources.

Beyond his technical skills, Anshul has an incredible work ethic and collaborative spirit. He’s a go-to resource for the team, always willing to support others and share knowledge. Any organization would be fortunate to have someone with Anshul's talent, drive, and commitment. I highly recommend him and am confident he’ll bring exceptional value wherever he goes.”
